Module com.library
Package com.library.Services

Interface SerializationServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
SerializationService
public interface SerializationServiceInterface
An interface for serializing and deserializing objects using Java serialization. Provides methods for saving and loading data to and from files.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Book>
    deserializeBooks(String filePath)
    Deserializes a list of books from the specified file path using Java serialization.
    List<Loan>
    deserializeLoans(String filePath)
    Deserializes a list of loans from the specified file path using Java serialization.
    List<User>
    deserializeUsers(String filePath)
    Deserializes a list of users from the specified file path using Java serialization.

    serializeBooks(List<Book> books, String filePath)
    Serializes a list of books to the specified file path using Java serialization.

  • Method Details

    • serializeBooks

      void serializeBooks(List<Book> books, String filePath) throws IOException
      Serializes a list of books to the specified file path using Java serialization.
      Parameters:
      books - The list of books to serialize.
      filePath - The file path to save the serialized data.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during serialization.

    • deserializeBooks

      List<Book> deserializeBooks(String filePath) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Deserializes a list of books from the specified file path using Java serialization.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The file path to load the serialized data.
      Returns:
      The deserialized list of books.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during deserialization.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the class of the serialized object cannot be found.

    • serializeUsers

      void serializeUsers(List<User> users, String filePath) throws IOException
      Serializes a list of users to the specified file path using Java serialization.
      Parameters:
      users - The list of users to serialize.
      filePath - The file path to save the serialized data.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during serialization.

    • deserializeUsers

      List<User> deserializeUsers(String filePath) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Deserializes a list of users from the specified file path using Java serialization.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The file path to load the serialized data.
      Returns:
      The deserialized list of users.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during deserialization.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the class of the serialized object cannot be found.
